name: request_mermaid_generation
description: Generate a Mermaid diagram from a natural language description. Supports flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, state diagrams, ER diagrams, and more.

description.description: Natural language description of the diagram to generate

diagram_type.description: Type of diagram (flowchart, sequence, class, state, er, gantt, pie, mindmap)

style_preferences.description: Optional style preferences for the diagram

name: validate_and_render_mermaid
description: Validate Mermaid diagram code and render it to an image format (PNG, SVG, or PDF).

mermaid_code.description: Mermaid diagram code to validate and render

output_format.description: Output format for the rendered diagram

name: get_mermaid_examples
description: Get example Mermaid diagrams for learning and reference. Returns examples filtered by diagram type, complexity, or industry.

name: analyze_diagram
description: Analyze a Mermaid diagram to extract structure, relationships, and semantic meaning.

name: suggest_improvements
description: Suggest improvements for a Mermaid diagram based on best practices, readability, and visual clarity.

mermaid_code.description: Mermaid diagram code to analyze for improvements

focus_areas.description: Areas to focus on (readability, style, structure, accessibility)

name: convert_diagram_style
description: Convert a diagram between different Mermaid styles or apply a new visual theme.

target_style.description: Target style or theme to apply

name: generate_from_code
description: Generate Mermaid diagrams from source code analysis. Supports class diagrams, sequence diagrams, and flowcharts.

language.description: Programming language of the source code

name: generate_from_data
description: Generate diagrams from structured data (JSON or CSV). Automatically detects patterns and creates appropriate visualizations.

data.description: Structured data in JSON or CSV format

name: modify_diagram
description: Apply specific modifications to an existing Mermaid diagram such as adding nodes, changing relationships, or updating labels.

name: merge_diagrams
description: Intelligently merge two Mermaid diagrams into a single cohesive diagram.

name: extract_subgraph
description: Extract a portion of a larger diagram as a standalone subgraph.

node_ids.description: IDs of nodes to include in the extracted subgraph

name: optimize_layout
description: Optimize diagram layout for better readability and visual presentation.
